name: Feedback Loop (bodro, qw3rtyuu)
description:
This game was made during the "Jame Gam" game jam. Time was limited, which means it may be unclear and unbalanced. It's still a fun little experiment; you should give it a try!

GOAL

Be an influencer, throw your phone at people, get views, get money, buy stuff, repeat. This game will make you feel as useless to society as a real influencer is.

CONTROLS

In "Aiming Mode":

  • Move mouse left and right to aim.
  • Press left mouse button to enter "Throw Mode".

In "Throw Mode":

  • Press and Hold left mouse button.
  • Quickly drag and release the left mouse button.

You should be able to figure out the rest.
